alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 9:40PM AKST until December 21 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Juneau area. * WHEN...Through noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected after midnight through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
